body.name: Chaps Men's Big and Tall Sweater - Heavyweight Classic Fit Cotton Crewneck Pullover Sweater for Men (L-4X Big & Tall)
features: OFFICIALLY LICENSED CHAPS: Men's Big and Tall Cotton Crewneck Pullover Sweater; Ever relevant, always relatable, Chaps remains true to our original spirited tradition

HIGH QUALITY SWEATER: Stay on top of cold weather with our big and tall cotton men's sweater; Perfect for layering when the temperature drops, you'll stay comfortable without compromising your style; Step into the office or class looking sharp with a handsome crewneck pullover; Choose from neutral tones for a classic look or go bold with vibrant colors

PREMIUM COTTON: Reach for a classic crewneck men's sweater to pair with jeans and your favorite shoes; Durable, medium weight, and extra soft cotton fabric will ensure you stay warm and comfortable throughout the day; Whether you're at work, school, running errands, or lounging at home, you'll love this classic pullover for men

VERSATILE: Timeless, stylish, and suitable for a variety of occasions, our men's big and tall sweater will add a touch of classic sophistication to your wardrobe; Practical and effortlessly fashionable, these sweaters will help you nail that smart-casual look; Perfect for everyday wear, our men's crewnecks will give your outfit an instant boost

PERFECT GIFT: Looking for a great gift for that special guy in your life? Made of super soft cotton fabric, this big and tall men's sweater is the perfect Christmas or birthday present that he will appreciate and love wearing every day; Expand his collection with this handsome sweater; Great gift idea for your boyfriend, husband, father, brother, son, grandson, nephew, uncle, cousin, and friend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a sweater for everyday use for the weeks that I needed an extra layer. I am volumetrically impaired and sweaters are often too tight or too bulky. 3x for me was just right as my 3rd layer (over a t shirt and heavy demin shirt) and under down vest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This almost-black (but actually navy) sweater is a great wardrobe staple in my opinion. It is warm, but not bulky. The tight knit means it could be worn under a blazer if desired, or with a turtleneck underneath for extra warmth, without too much bulk.The sleeves are good and long and the torso is also long enough for a tall man. The XL aspect is where the sweater seems a tiny bit skimpy. I guess it is hard to precisely define XL. This one could be a little more generous in the cut in that regard.Overall, a good solid sweater that should be useful in a number of settings and goes with jeans or nicer pants.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised at how well this fits. I am 6’2, 250 and the XL fit me great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this twice. First time arrived was black with gray stripe as seen in my picture (open laid out) Kept anyways because my husband liked it and fits well. Ordered again thinking was a mistake. Got same exact shirt again. Black with stripe. (still in package) This is not a solid black shirt as they are saying. Returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warmest sweater I ever had.
reviews.reviewText: This is a heavy knit sweater that's perfect for winter. Looks great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality & true to size
reviews.reviewText: It’s hard finding big and tall sizes but this brand is actually made for the sizing and they are definitely true to their word , material is great and thick , stretchable & almost like moisture wicking 10/10 approves

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very long indeed, arms are also long
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a nice sweater; the fabric isn't particularly soft, but it's well-made, put together nicely, and looks good. I'd say it's definitely for a taller man with broad shoulders, but the room in the belly area isn't quite as large as you'd expect for an XL. I'm a woman and I have hips and a butt, if you were a big guy and needed extra room, I'd go one size larger.Pros:-Nicely made-Looks good-long in both body and armsCons:-not as soft or warm as I'd expect for a sweaterConclusion:-I'd buy it again, it's nice and presentable and durable._____________________My rating system:5 Stars: Blew my mind, excellent.4 Stars: Really good.3 Stars: Average, nothing to write home about.2 Stars: It has some problems.1 Star: I don't like it and wouldn't get it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Fit…Good Quality
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this ‘Chaps Men's Big and Tall Sweater’ because, basically, I was in need of a black crew neck sweater. I’m familiar with the Chaps brand, so I figured it would be a good choice.I am very happy with both the fit and quality of this sweater. I ordered an XL Tall, and it runs very true to size. It’s both long enough in the body and the arms, and adequately sized across the chest.The quality of this ‘Chaps Men's Big and Tall Sweater’ is very good as well. The weave is tight, and there are no loose threads or loose seams. The sweater feels very heavy when you hold it, so I know it’s a dense weave. The sweater has good elasticity as well.This sweater looks good on, too. I like that the neckline is high…I know it won’t sag. And it drapes well.All in all, this ‘Chaps Men's Big and Tall Sweater’ is good choice in my opinion for a basic black sweater. The quality is good..the sizing is accurate…and it looks and feels great on. I can definitely recommend it.
